professional.name: Company Logos
description: ABN AMRO wanted to offer a new functionality for corporate clients to show their company logos in the mutation overview in internet banking.

I was part of the SCRUM team building this widget for the internet banking application. During the project I was responsible for building the front-end using the JavaScript framework AngularJS as well as integrating the widget in the existing internet banking application.

professional.name: Van meten naar weten
description: Sportinnovator wanted to offer the national athletes a more innovative way to show training statistics. Normally the statistics are available after a few days, but it is better for the athletes to get this feedback directly after their training.

I was part of a SCRUM team at Capgemini to build a portal showing training statistics directly after training. Our team was building the whole application including front-end, back-end and database. During the project I was responsible for rebuilding the exisiting application in such a way that there were only reusable components. I used the JavaScript framework AngularJS together with Admin-LTE.

side.name: Kodi on iMon
description: The display of my media center was not working with the latest version of Kodi anymore. Since there was no solution available I decided to create this functionality myself. I found an example and a driver how to write static text to the screen.
During the project I made it possible to put scrollable text on the screen with adjustable speed as well as connecting to the Kodi API to read the media information.
